QuestData.Title: Search the Place
QuestData.Description:
Zerekriss is ours... along with everything it contains.
The Primus was personally involved in the design of this necropolis. It was truly a sight to witness his hands shape the form of this vessel.
It would be wise to search the room. Perhaps he kept some tools here that might be of use to us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Check the Foreman's Chest for anything valuable.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver the Bindings of Fleshcrafting to Draka at the Seat of the Primus.

Objectives.Objective: Use Transport Pad: Zerekriss Upper Floor
